title: Un Pere Theriyadhu Lyrics Engeyum Eppodhum Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Lyrics : Na Muthukumar 
Music Director : Sathya C
Movie: Engeyum Eppodhum

Un Pere Theriyadhu, unnai koopida mudiyadhu 
Naan unakorr per vaithaen, unnake theriyadhu
Andha perai ariyaadha,ada yaarum ingaedhu
Adha orumurai sonnale, thookam varaaadhu
Ada dhinam dhorum adhai solli unnai konjuven
Naan adangaatha anbale unnai minjuven

You never find a better time
Make a stand you w'll be fine

hOh.. soodaana perum adhuthaan
Sonnavudan udhadugal kodhikum
Suriyanai neyum ninaithaal adhu illaye
Hooh..chillendra perum adhuthaan
Ketavudan nenjam kulirum
Nadhi endru neyum ninaithaal adhu illaye
Silirkavaikum dheivamillai
Miratavaikum mirugamillai
Olivattam therindhaalum, adhu pataa perillai
En perin pinnal varum per naan sollava..?

You never find a better time
Make a stand you w'll be fine

Peridhaana perum ahduthaan, Solla sila mooche vaangum
Ethanai ezhuthukal endral vidai illaye
Sirithaana perum adhuthaan, Sattendru mudindhe pogum
Eppadi solven naano mozhi illaye....

Sollivittal udhadu ottum, Elluthivittal thaenum sottum
Adhu sutha tamil perthan, ayal varthai adhil illai
En perin pinnal varum per naan sollava..?

Un Pere Theriyadhu, unnai koopida mudiyadhu 
Naan unakorr per vaithaen, unnake theriyadhu
Ada dhinamdhorum adhai solli unnai konjuven
Naan adangaatha anbale unnai minjuven
